Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm a long time lurker who's done pretty much everything except land on Tylo and return from Eve. I don't normally have great unlimited internet access because I work at sea. But I'm home on vacation, so I figured I'd post thoughts and see what happens. You all seem like a pretty positive community.

Cheers,

-Vic

Hey there,

welcome on the KSP Forum. You work at sea? Where, when I may ask? On a ship or on something else? I'm interested!

However, would be great to hear something about that. Have fun on the Forum, and if you've got questions, just ask!
Welcome aboard! Hope to see and read your stories. It's always great to know what other players have done in this game!

Hi!

I work as an entertainment tech on a cruise ship. It's a pretty fun gig and I get to do a lot of travel on someone else's dime, which is always great.

And thanks everyone for the warm welcome. I'm currently trying to optimize my Minmus and Mun orbital labs and science landers. We'll see what happens.

-Vic

VELCOME

:thunder and lightning:

THERE IS NO RETURN

I'm not the best at making people feel assured...welcome to the forum!
